hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Abbas said:"The she-Camel of a ma in Ihram broke his neck and killed him. He was brought to the Messenger of Allah and he said 'Wash him and shroud him, and do not cover his head, or bring any perfume near him, for he will be raisd reciting Talbiyah.'" (Sahih) Dies

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ أَنْ يُحَنَّطَ الْمُحْرِمُ إِذَا مَاتَ .
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Applying Aromatics To The Muhrum If He Dies
